language.name: English
language.string: Queen Anne's Revenge: Powerful pirate flagship with broadside attack and flame attack abilities.
Effective attack that burns enemy ships to dust.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Queen Anne's Revenge 

Powerfull ship destroyer with greek fire attack. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
Admiral of the Pirates
"Take what you can, give nothing back!"
"Don't take it personally. Someone just paid us more."
"Take what you can, give nothing back!"
Legendary captain: Choose a legendary pirate captain with a mighty flagship.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Black Pearl 

Very fast, trains buccaneers, increases their build limit. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
The Recruitment
For the rest of the game, a very small trickle of Coin enriches you.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Neptune's Galley 

Long-range attack. All buccaneers become corsairs. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
Barbary Revolution
Recruit a privateer ship faster and for better price.
Tortuga dock can recruit available privateers from nearby areas - cheaper and faster than your docks and allows you to recruit a legendary pirate captain. Privateer build limit increased by 1.
Choose a legendary pirate captain with a mighty flagship.
Tortuga builds an enormous fixed gun which helps you to destroy enemy units. Be careful, when you loose your trading post, this gun may be taken by an enemy player.
Reveals all treasures on the map for you and your allies. Grants 250 Experience points.
All Tortuga land and naval units train much faster and cost less resources. Does not affect your dock and other trading posts.
Pirate ship (all classes) damage and hitpoints increased.
Highly increases ship guardian attack. Slightly helps your Explolrer to fight with outlaws.
ZP SPC Pirate Fixed Gun Passive
Black Pearl: Pirate flagsip with a powerful broadside attack ability. Trains buccaneers.
Neptune's Galley: Powerful pirate siege ship with broadside attack and long-range siege attack abilities.
Increases all pirate ship (all classes) attack and hitpoints. Increasing privateer build limit.
Privateers can train bucaneers. Decreasing Buccaneer costs and training time.
Maltese hand cavalry, good against ranged infantry and artillery.
Healers can heal more efectively. Adds Maltese Knights a healing ability.
All fishing boats gather much more food and every dock you build spawns one free settler.
Maltese Rigged Ship. Can train Maltese Units.
Sends Maltese Rigged Ship full of surgeons.
Wall hitpoints and tower damage and line of sight increased.
Choose Maltese Order Faction which provides you some special shipments.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIALITY:</color> 
Sends naval units 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TECHS:</color> 
Maltese Humanitarian Fleet 

Maltese Colonizaction Fleet
Sends powerful Ship of the Line able to build Docks and a Colonization Wagon to colonize another islands on board of the ship.
Starts a new town or builds some other building of your choice.

The Caribbean islands are not only endless sandy beaches and busy trade ports attracting ships from Europe and America. The islands are also a seat of dangerous pirate gangs. Can their presence be used as a strategic advantage?
Pirates of the Caribbean: a collection of islands in warm ocean waters.\n\nSettlements: Caribs, Pirates
"The Grandmaster may consent to form an alliance, should you build a Trading Post here."
Ships 2 Bank Wagons. Transfor into a Banks.
Corsairs of Mediterranean: Collection of Mediterranean islands \n\nSettlements: Maltese Order, Venetians, Pirates
Corsairs spread around the Mediterranean. They can be either powerful allies or enemies.
Grants resources for future control of Trading Routes.\n â€¢ Trade Routes: Future income improved by +25%
Upgrade Wokou unit's attack and hitpoints.
Blackmail a politician to improve your influence.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Wokou Army 

Costs population but is cheap and gets trained very fast. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
The Big Theft (Treasure Ship)
Ships a Treasure Ship stolen by your Wokou alies with Sao Feng himself on board.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Wokou Monk 

Native archer. Shipments from foreign allies. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
Pacific Allies (Random Legendary Ship)
Ships Fire Junks and enables you a Fire Junk training in your Dock.
Unique steam powered warship able to train Flamethrowers and detect submarines and other stealth units.

A Wokou force of archers, ronins and a horseman, good for raiding enemy ports.
3 Wokou Monk: archer with a lucky shot, good against infantry.
2 Wokou Ronins 
1 Wokou Rider
Ships a Wokou army and reduces Wokou units population costs.
Sends a random legendary pirate ship

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Floating Dragon 

Mighty flagship able to train wokou pirates. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
Kamigadze (Fire Junks)
Wokou Flagship with powerful broadside attack.
Choose a Wokou Pirate leader and get new special units and technologies.
Extends Monastery influence. Allows you to train new units, buildings and provides you completely new techs and shipments.
Allows the native settlers to build Rice Paddies.
Ships a Zen Mountain Monastery Rickshaw to build a fortified Sohei base.
Ships a Consulate Rickshaw and allows all the civilisations to build a consulate and pick a foreign ally.
ZP SPC Zen Mountain Monastery Rickshaw
Improves your mercenary's attack and hitpoints.
Ships a variety of powerful Indian mercenaries.
Ships a variety of powerful Japanese mercenaries.
Ships a Fort Wagon that allows you tu build a mighty fort.
A powerful defensive building that produces native Zen warriors.
Monastery gets a cannon attack and more hitpoints.
Upgrades the White Fort and adds it more hitpoints.
Upgrade a Naval Trade Route to use Treasure Ships, which move slower but can deliver much more resources.
Request Hand Mortar deliveries at this Trading Post.
This Trading Post is delivering Hand Mortars.
Upgrades this Naval Trade Route to use Trade Junks, which can deliver resources, move faster and provide a line of sight.
Extends Mosque influence. Allows you to train new units, buildings and provides you completely new techs and shipments.
Burma Monasteries: Large Sea map with several major Zen Monasteries and Sufi Mosques. \n\nSettlements: Zen Great Buddha Monastery, Sufi Great Mosque, Wokou
Large Sea map with several major Zen Monasteries and Sufi Mosques. Who controls the monasteries, controls the map.
Extends City influence. Allows you to train new units, buildings and provides you completely new techs and shipments. Increases Aztec units build limit.
Select to choose a local power with which to align.
Allows you to build mighty defensive structures.
Build a local Meeting Point and pick a partner from a different tribe.
Delivers Skull Knights and allows their training.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Holcan Javelineer, Healer 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TECHS:</color> 
Cotton Armor, Maya Calendar, Maya Pyramids

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Lightning Warrior 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TECHS:</color> 
Food of the Gods, Cult of the Dead, Cloud People
Upgrades this Naval Trade Route to use Trade Caravels, which can deliver resources, move faster and provide a line of sight.
Upgrades this Naval Trade Route to use Steamers, which move faster and provide a greater line of sight.

Aztec Gold (Migration Map): Discover ancient Aztec cities hidden in the jungle. Players start in divided areas on one river bank with very limited resources and have to migrate to the other bank. \n\nSettlements: Aztec Cities, Renegades
The secret is hidden behind the river. The legendary ancients cities should be right there. Who discovers them first? You or your enemy?
Radically eradicates corruption. Villagers are gathering all resources faster by 15%.
Trains Jewish units, autogeathers coin and heals nearby units.
Ships a Jewish Settlement Wagon and increases Jewish Settler build limit.
Improves Jewish Settler attack and hitpoints.
Villagers gather food from farms faster.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
War Wagon 

Mighty war wagon with a cannon. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TECHS:</color> 
German Universities 
(Faster research)
All research is done faster by 50%
Higher birthrate causes that all units get trained faster by 25%
All buildings get built faster and have more hitpoints.
Use Fishing Boats to mine the salt
The Dead Sea: Large valley with player's castles and a salty lake in the middle \n\nSettlements: Jewish, Maltese, Sufi Blue Mosque
Large lake map map with several major Sufi Mosques, Maltese villages and Jewish settlements. Who controls the natives, controls the map.

Submerge: \nSubmerged submarine with no silent drive is not completely invisible but moves a bit faster and is hart to hit. 40% Damage bonus against ships and dock. 50% more hitpoints. Can't attack land targets.
Surface: \nSurfaced Submarine moves very fast and can attack buildings and land units.
Silent Drive: \nSubmarine becomes invisible and can get closer to enemy ships but moves very slow. 40% Damage bonus against ships and dock. 50% more hitpoints. Can't attack land targets.
A warship designed to operate completely submerged in the sea.
Allows completely silent operation using the silent drive.
Submerged submarine with no silent service mod is not completely invisible but it's hart to hit.
At home, we've been called crazy. In this wasteland we can conduct our experiments undisturbed.
Pick a renegade captain and train new units and research new techs

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Experimental Submarine 

Technical revolutionary and underwater explorer. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TECHS:</color> 
Legendary Nautilus, Submarine Fleet

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Experimental Tank 

Leonardo's admirer and mortal engine's designer. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TECHS:</color> 
Leonardo's Model, Tank Battalion

Protect Dock: \nSubmerged submarine stands to protects dock or trading post and doesn't move around the map. 40% Damage bonus against ships and dock. Can't attack land targets. 50% more hitpoints. Nearby Building hitpoints increased by 75%.
All research is done faster by 25%
Ships an steam-powered Destroyer able to train Flamethrowers and detect submarines.
Ships an advanced hot air balloon.
Ships an Academy Wagon able to build a new colony buildings allowing you some further advanced improvements.
Biology \nIncreases infantry and cavalry hitpoints by 10%
Machinery \nIncreases artillery and warship hitpoints by 10%
Chemistry \nIncreases gunpowder unit attack by 10% and artillery attack by 5%
Allows you to build a whole submarines fleet
Upgrades Experimental tank based on Leonardo's model.
Allows you to build a whole Mortal Engine Army.
Two continents - Asia and America - separated by Bering's Strait. The real end of the world and a perfect place for renegades and technical revolutionaries. \n\nSettlements: Renegades, Inuits
The First Cold War: Use the latest technical inventions to gain an advantage over the enemy.
Inuit pet, can gather food from huntables.
Native warrior equipped with an automatic harpoon
Villagers gather food from huntables faster.
All infantry moves on snow faster
Increases Inuit units attack and hitpoints
Unlocks more Inuit units and techs
Attracts Caribous Herds directly to the middle of your settlement.
Attracts Champion warriors from other native tribes
Strong attack, very efficient for fishing and especially whaling. Can detect stealth units like submarines.
Destructive flying crow. Especially effective against buildings.
Mustard gas flying crow which slowly causes significant damage to all nearby units including yours.
Flying Fortress. Can transport units and can be repaired in dock as a standard ship. Explodes after taking signifficant damage.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Experimental Airship 

Pioneer of aviation and air pirate. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TECHS:</color> 
Air Attack, Mustard Gas
Equips your airship with flying crows and, it a special anti-airship attack and improves it's hitpoints.
Adds your airship a special attack ability and improves it's current attack and hitpoints.
Shows enemy positions on the map
Submarine dives and rams enemy ship. Strong bonus against advanced wooden ships like Frigate or Monitor.
Spawns native ships after it's training in a Trading Post and repairs all ships.
Delivers two Aztec Ritual Canoes and allows you to train them in your dock.
European adventurer armed with a musket and sword.
Extends mission's influence. Allows you to train new units and provides you completely new techs and shipments.
Uncovers secret plans for Leonardo's Machina Magnifica.
Ships a Congregation Wagon and unlocks the Monastic Grange building as well as new Congregation techs.
Ships native warriors from all over the world.
Economic building, heals nearby units. Missionaries gather all resources faster.
Converts enemy units, heals and gathers herbs.
Increases the hitpoints of Jesuit missionaries. Enables them to heal units in combat and from further away.
Players start on separate islands with enough resources, trade route and a native settlement. \n\nSettlements: Pirates, Wokou, Jesuit
The war between European and Asian Pirate troops is starting on the Philippines! Who will win?
Migration Map, players start on very small islands with limited resources and have to migrate on one of two central islands. \n\nSettlements: Pirates, Renegades
"We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend." -- Robert Luis Stevenson
Venetian units attack and hitpoints increased.
Renegade unit attack and hitpoints increased.
Pick one of Venetian noble houses which will have the biggest influence.
Not enough resources for this Venetian shipment.
"Everything has a price, even loyality. If you have money, we can be friends."
Grants resources for future control of Trading Routes.\n â€¢ Trade Routes: Future income improved by +20%
Increases ship speed and line of sight
Signifficantly improves dock hitpoints, decreases it's costs and buildtime.
Improves Venetian Ships attack and hitpoints
Trains any type of war ships and trains it very fast.
Ships a Dry Dock wagon able to a build dry dock.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Venetian Galleass 

Powerfull siege troopers. Increased galley build limit. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
Dry Dock
Causes signifficant poison damage to nearby units including yours.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Dottore della Morte 

Perfect unit for sabotage missions in enemy base. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
Venetian Embassy

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Experimental Bombard 

Heavy Venetian artillery, perfect to break enemy walls. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECH:</color> 
Sea Fort
Ships a Flatboat able to build a mighty naval fort.
Flatboat can build a mighty naval fort.
Increases Naval Fort Damage ad Hitpoints
Increases Naval Fort attack range and line of sight
Castello di Santa Margherita Ligure (Naval Fort)
This Dry Dock is working on innovative constructions to increase warship speed.
Innovative Construction \nConfigure Dry Dock to increase warship speed by 20%.
This Dry Dock is providing Quality Control to increase warship hitpoints.
Quality Control \nConfigure Dry Dock to increase warship hitpoints by 10%.
This Dry Dock is providing Heavy Weapons to increase warship attack.
Heavy Weapons \nConfigure Dry Dock to increase warship attack by 10%.
This Dry Dock is building ships faster.
Mass Production \nConfigure Dry Dock to build ships faster by 150%.
This Dry Dock is focusing on repairing ships.
Repair \nConfigure Dry Dock to repair ships faster by 300%.
This Dry Dock is maintaining Venetian Galleys.
Automatic Workshop \nConfigure Dry Dock to maintain Venetian Galleys.
Ships a Venetian Embassy Wagon and unlocks more Venetian shipments which can be sent from the Embassy building.
Ships Doge's Guards (Can be sent in always when bellow build limit: 12)
Ships Venetian Bombard (Can be sent in always when bellow build limit: 2)
Ships Venetian Galleass (Can be sent in always when bellow build limit: 2)
Ships Adriatic Sea Mercenaries (Can be sent always when bellow population limit)
All native units get trained faster and cost less resources

Large naval map with two sea shores and a water trade route. 

Settlements: Venetians, Jesuits 

Additional Settlements: Maltese or Orthodox
Even loyality can be bought. Venetians are powerful allies. Make an alliance with them and dominate over the Adriatic Sea.

Collection of mediterranean islands and two worlds: Europe and the Orient. 

Settlements: Venetians, Pirate, Scientists. 

Other possible settlements (based on variation): Maltese, Jesuit, Sufi, Jewish
The barrier between Occident and Orient is moving every closer together.

Malta and Gozo Archipelago: Large naval map with fortified player Town centers. You start on the same island as your enemy. 

Recommended player setup: 
2 vs 2 
3 vs 3 
4 vs 4 

Settlements: Maltese, Pirates
Malta is a centrer of Mediterranean trade. The ships are comming from all the directions. Who controls Malta, controls the Mediterranean.
If ye be brave or fool enough to face a pirates curse, proceed. Take heed, wretched curs. Your fate is sealed.
Flamethrower soldier with a strong flame attack. Good against Infantry.
Pilgrims are comming and giving their gifts. Buy new icons for the monastery and get a small trickle of additional resources.
Your units generate more XP after being trained.
Blesed weapons are slightly more destructive.
Upgrades Orthodox units attack and hitpoints.
Improves Bastion hitpoints and adds a powerful cannon attack.

Deffensive Improvements 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Monaspa Lancer 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECHS:</color> 
Monastery Bastion, Caucassian Borderlands

Naval improvements 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Bulgarian Boyar 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECHS:</color> 
Danube Steamers, Black Sea Fleet

Offensive improvements 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Dvoryanin 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL TECHS:</color> 
Russian Guard, Tsar Kolokol
Ships a powerful Steam-powered Siege Ship.
Ships a Bastion Wagon, allows Mountain Jaegers to construct Bastions and allows you to train all Orthodox units directly in the Bastions.
Small Islands between Hokaido Island and Kamchatka Peninsula. Players have more option for migration to larger islands around. \n\nSettlements: Renegades, Wokou, Orthodox, Zen
Kuril Islands, islands of eternal strife. Use the natives to take the technological advantage over your enemy.
OHeavy Cavalry equipped with a sword
Sends powerful cavalry units led by Sohei Master.
Heavy Ranged Cavalry Hero with an Attack Bonus Aura.
Heavy Ranged Cavalry Hero with an Attack Bonus Aura. Daimyo Class unit.
Heavy native Ranged Cavalry, good against infantry.
Spawns an Armored Train which will attack an enemy base. Can be casted on a Train Station next to the enemy position.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Experimental Machine Gun 

Billionaire with a penchant for opera and explosives. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TECHS:</color> 
Money Factory, Military Railways
Unlocks a special alility: Armored Train - can send an armored train to attack enemy positions next to a Train Station.

Unlocks the military use of the trade routes: 
 â€¢ Discovers all Train Stations on the map 
 â€¢ Upgrades all trade routes to the Train level 
 â€¢ Unlocks the Armored Train ability allowing you to use an armore train to attack enemy base
Armored Train: Spawns an Armored Train which will attack an enemy base. <color=1.0, 0.0, 0.0>Can't be used when another Armored Train is being on the map.</color>
Wagon Crew: Spawns 4 Flamethrowers to defend the Train
Villagers gather gold from buildings faster by 20%.
Every Residental building spawns one Cowboy to protect the territory.

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>TRAINING:</color> 
Nutracker Soldier 

Strong, disciplined musketeer that excels in melee. 

<color=1.0, 0.9, 0.5>SPECIAL BUILDING:</color> 
Toy Factory
Pick a specialty among the Christmas Village to unlock new units and buildings.
"Not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse."
A decorative figurine, embodied into a formidable soldier.
One of Santa's most trusted workshops.
Fast, short-ranged artillery firing special candy charges.
TEAM Spread the cheer and ship crates of presents for every 10 minutes the game passes, up to 30 minutes.
Warm your spirits and boost your villager's movement speed.
Provides every home with a decorative tree.
Allows you to upgrade your trade route to the Polar Express for free in an earlier age.
Ships the village workshop wagon to your homecity.
Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you guide my sleigh tonight?
Sends a Workshop wagon and allows you to construct a gift producing workshop.
Elite skirmisher well suited for the season.
Upgrades your village's units to veteran level.
Upgrades your village's units to guard level.
Scout unit pulled by a pair of reindeer.
Silent Night: Teams occupy opposing valleys, separated by a mountain pass. \n\nSettlements: Christmas Village

'Tis the season! Players find themselves in a valley, separated from their enemies by the central mountain. The map features a single trade route as well as an assortment of festive decorations and accents.
A heavy stagecoach armed to take on the wild west.
A Mounted Cowboy hailing from the wild west.
An office and jailhouse capable of holding outlaws.
